attributes.title: this app stinks
attributes.review: while in hopes of trying to get on board with our president, i downloaded this app. to my surprise, i was SHOCKED!!!!!!!! this app is terrifying and i was truly scared. not sure why anyone would want this app.

attributes.title: KILLED MY CAT!!!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible! I downloaded it and all my animals started dropping off one by one. The app literally started speaking to me and told me that it was the reason my animals were dying. THIS APP NEEDS TO BE DELETED!!

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: This app is just about the worst thing i’ve ever used. as soon as I clicked it, it started glitching and showing ugly pictures of oompa loompas! I will never use this again!

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: I had hopes and dreams when I opened this app thinking trump had good ideas on how to improve our society. Turns out I was wrong and I do not support any of his ideas and this app is a no no for me.

attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY PEEPAW🤬🤧
attributes.review: this app was absolutely disgusting. to start off this app was so scary that my peepaw died when he saw it. when i spoke directly to trump about this issue he told me to find a new peepaw. i am so done with this terrible app😡

attributes.title: makdaddy🥰🤪🤪
attributes.review: this app is horrible. my phone kept crashing when I opened the app and I’m genuinely disgusted that trump is our president and this app is set up so bad it’s so hard to find anything.
